# PowerBI native visuals

![native](assets/native1.png)

PowerBi offers a group of native visualizations that we will build most of the dashboard using them. 

## Comparison visuals
### Comparing Numerical values of 1 or more categories
#### Clustered bar/Column chart  
### Comparing Numerical values of 1 or more categories and Comparing their totals
#### Stacked bar/Column chart  

### Comparing Percentages
#### 100% Stacked Bar/Coumn chart  



## Change over time visuals
### Displaying Numerical values of 1 or more categories over time dimension
#### Line/Area chart
### Displaying Numerical values of 1 or more categories over time dimension with focus on Ranking and changes 
#### Ribbon chart
### Displaying Numerical values of 1 or more categories over time dimension with focus on their total

## Combo charts
Adding time dimension to comparison visuals or Adding categorical values to change over time visuals
